title: Lifeclimb
creator_credit: Stan Zundell, Pyramid Films and Stan Zundell Productions
brief_description: A documentary in which 64 year old Stan Zundell describes the manner in which he has faced the difficulties and challenges of aging. Shows how he continually challenges himself with rigorous physical activity, increasing his abilities as he struggles to achieve his goals.
creator_credit_for_label: Stan Zundell, Pyramid Films and Stan Zundell Productions
